remarks: The span of the transpositions is the subgroup that moves finitely many points.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Aug-2015.)
statement:
symgtrf.t $e |- T = ran ( pmTrsp ` D ) $.
symgtrf.g $e |- G = ( SymGrp ` D ) $.
symgtrf.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
symggen.k $e |- K = ( mrCls ` ( SubMnd ` G ) ) $.
symggen $p |- ( D e. V -> ( K ` T ) = { x e. B | dom ( x \ _I ) e. Fin } ) $.
$d B x $.
$d D x $.
$d G x $.
$d K x $.
$d T x $.
$d V x $.
